articles.content: CARSON, Calif (Feb. 20, 2024) The U.S. Womens National Team opened its 2024 Concacaf W Gold Cup campaign with a convincing 5-0 win against the Dominican Republic. A brace from 18-year-old midfielder … [+6409 chars]
